Chattanooga.Mizpah Congregation:
.
The Mizpah congregation is a Reform synagogue located in Chattanooga, Tennessee.


== History ==
A Jewish settlement in Chattanooga, TN, the community can be traced back to before the US Civil War, However, it wasn’t until after the war that the Jewish community was really established. In 1860 German immigrants Fannie Schwartzenberg Bach and Jacob Bach made their home there.
